Text:
Led by musical brothers John and Ed Kemmick, at far left and right, the Peach Pickers perform on the Garage Pub stage in 2012. Spur of the Momentâ€™s repertoire spans Americana music spectrum, include tight strains of bluegrass. They perform Saturday morning at Kennedy's on Billings' West End. The Peach Pickers will reunite on Friday, Feb. 26, for a show at Yellowstone Valley Brewing Co.'s Garage Pub to raise money for vocalist-guitarist Ed Kemmick's news website, Last Best News.
